headline: META Stock Target Raised to $900 by Citizens, Citing Strong AI-Driven Growth
summary: Meta Platforms, Inc. (NASDAQ:META) is one of the Hot AI Stocks to Keep on Your Radar. On October 10, Citizens analyst reiterated a Market Outperform rating on the stock with a $900.00 price target. The firm highlighted how artificial intelligence is a significant growth driver for Meta, boosting advertiser returns and sustaining strong spending across the […]

headline: Thinking Machines Lab co-founder Tulloch departs for Meta, WSJ reports
summary: A Thinking Machines Lab spokesperson confirmed the departure to the WSJ, saying that "Andrew has decided to pursue a different path for personal reasons".  Thinking Machines Lab could not immediately be reached for comment.  Meta did not respond to a request for comment.

raw.headline: Thinking Machines Lab co-founder Tulloch departs for Meta, WSJ reports

headline: Thinking Machines Lab Co-Founder Departs for Meta
summary: A co-founder of  Mira Murati’s  Thinking Machines Lab has left to join  Meta Platforms  the startup confirmed Saturday.  Andrew Tulloch,  a star AI researcher, confirmed his departure in a message to employees on Friday, according to people familiar with the matter.  “Andrew has decided to pursue a different path for personal reasons,” a spokeswoman for Thinking Machines Lab said in a statement.

headline: Could Meta (META) Collaboration on AI Creator Tools Reveal a New Edge in Influencer Strategy?
summary: Aspire.io recently announced the launch of Aspire's AI Instagram Discovery, developed with Meta's product team, utilizing Instagram's new creator marketplace API to help brands find high-performing creators through advanced conversational search and performance data. This collaboration highlights Meta's approach of powering partner-led innovation, enabling more precise and data-driven influencer marketing solutions for businesses using Instagram's ecosystem. We’ll explore how this expanded...
